data.name: REmatch
data.detailed_description: REmatch is an RPG game with a spooky, puzzle based, combat system. You got stuck in this unknown city, but you have to face all the challenging events to go home. Use your chess tactics to make decisions and fight whoever gets in your way. You are not the best, you are not the worst, you are a chess champion who creates solutions for all. Grab weapons, solve puzzles, explore and overcome the darkness.
data.about_the_game: REmatch is an RPG game with a spooky, puzzle based, combat system. You got stuck in this unknown city, but you have to face all the challenging events to go home. Use your chess tactics to make decisions and fight whoever gets in your way. You are not the best, you are not the worst, you are a chess champion who creates solutions for all. Grab weapons, solve puzzles, explore and overcome the darkness.
data.short_description: REmatch is an RPG, single player game. You are stuck in an unknown city, no one can help you except her. Explore the darkness, solve chess puzzles, and squash those who get in your way, and stay away from those who squashes you instead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-1065G7 CPU @ 1.30GHz 1.50 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 332 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.19 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 332 MB available space
